meanings.definition: Small fish used as bait for larger fish.
meanings.sent1: The baitfishes were tiny fish that were used to catch big fish.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen often use baitfishes to attract larger fish.
meanings.sent3: The baitfishes thought they were going on a fun adventure, but they ended up as bait!
meanings.sent4: The baitfishes swam nervously, knowing they were the key to catching the big prize.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering baitfishes danced in the water, tempting the hungry predators.

meanings.definition: The act of using baitfish to attract larger fish.
meanings.sent1: The baitfishes' purpose was to lure big fish closer.
meanings.sent2: Successful fishing requires skill in the art of baitfishes.
meanings.sent3: The baitfishes put on a show to attract the attention of the larger fish.
meanings.sent4: Her strategy involved strategically deploying the baitfishes to draw in the prize catch.
meanings.sent5: The baitfishes' performance was so convincing that even the cautious fish couldn't resist.

meanings.definition: A group of small fish used for bait.
meanings.sent1: The baitfishes huddled together, ready to be used as bait.
meanings.sent2: The bucket was filled with lively baitfishes for the fishing trip.
meanings.sent3: The baitfishes formed a tight-knit community in the fisherman's bait box.
meanings.sent4: The baitfishes swam in unison, creating a mesmerizing sight for the larger fish.
meanings.sent5: The baitfishes' teamwork was essential in attracting the attention of the predators.
